participant_1.background: i read twenty books a year. i'm a stunt double as my second job. i only eat kosher. i was raised in a single parent household.

participant_2.background: my family does not support my career choices. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches.

content.text: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost
I just got my first job as a stunt designer.
